titleStmt.title: The address of the honourable the House of Commons presented to his Majesty on Thursday the 25 day of April, 1689. With his Majesty's answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England. Parliament. House of Commons.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1702 : William and Mary)

notesStmt.note: House of Commons assuring King William III of their support for war against France.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
